# ‘계엄사령관’ 박안수 “포고령 ‘처단’ 글자 보고 ‘이건 또 뭐냐’ 싶었다” - 경향신문

[원문 링크](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTFBCaGZtMlhJa3hXdHpRX2g5UUMwUjEwUWNIMzlHVW1LX0FvRzBxd1YyWS1fR2tWTWhNR09zVjZDYVBuZU1Jd2xkQm9YQml5MlRrMUdtbjVFd0QtUdIBX0FVX3lxTE4wNjlET0xzZDlaNHdyQ0cwUnVmUjVrSFYySFliZFplZmJZOTYyczN5a0lQa0U0YnJfQ0M3T1A4cG1WMTJUaGlYb2NGT3JKSEhHMV9WZlhGMHUzcW5pbnBv?oc=5)
